refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a new image from a given part of GD2 file or URL

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
filename
Path to the GD2 image.
srcX
x-coordinate of source point.
srcY
y-coordinate of source point.
width
Source width.
height
Source height.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an image resource identifier on success, &false; on errors.
